Are you looking for eco-friendly alternatives to the food products that you usually consume? Wouldn’t it be amazing if you could access these details at your fingertips?

“Palau” is a powerful food scanning app that lets you scan food products and shows you the ecological impact they have on the environment. You are also provided with information about the nutritional value of the product. Apart from that, you are able to track your annual footprint by specifying your current diet. If you truly care about the environment, it’s time to start using the Palau app.

Palau also helps you discover alternative food products that have less impact on the environment. Get responsible with your food habits and switch to ecologically beneficial products.

◉ HOW DOES IT WORK?
Palau is a straightforward yet powerful product scanner app.
Here’s how it works - 
▸ Scan your product through the barcode
▸ Review the ecological impact and nutrition values
▸ Find alternatives that have a lower ecological impact yet the same nutritional value
▸ Specify your diet on the footprint page and edit it in greater detail
▸ Review your progress in making an impact
▸ Share your ecological impact with friends

All your past product scans are automatically saved in the scan history, so you will easily be able to check them later.

Palau not only helps you track your carbon footprint but it can also help you reduce it. The carbon footprint page breaks down your diet's footprint and shows you where most of your food emissions are coming from. With this information, you can then start to reduce your carbon footprint by following the Palau academy and changing your diet.

◉ KEY APP FEATURES AT A GLANCE
▸ Scan products using a powerful barcode scanner
▸ Know the Nutri score and the eco score
▸ Find the best food alternatives seamlessly
▸ Browse through past scan history
▸ Track your annual footprint for CO2 emissions, water usage and land usage
▸ Know your ecological impact & share it with others

Palau is the perfect app to help to make better food choices. Over time you will get to know the nutri score and the eco score of the food products that you find in the market. Buying sustainably and healthily will become second nature!


◉ ABOUT US
Palau is on a mission to help you reduce your ecological impact on the environment through better food habits. We’re making sustainability transparent. Community is everything! Together we have the power to make a change.

THE BASICS: 
1. Yummy and healthy recipes, using natural ingredients.
2. I love to replace „bad“ ingredients of classic recipes - for example cane sugar or white flour - with more healthy alternatives. Therefore we can still eat dessert. But we get important nutrients, vitamins and minerals at the same time. The result? Food and sugar cravings will say goodbye and you’ll start feeling happy with your healthy diet. 
3. Quick & easy! I know, it’s not possible to spend hours in the kitchen every day. Most recipes are therefore quick, easy & ideal for take-away.
4. All recipes are perfect for a fit lifestyle. Huge amounts of fats or sugar (alternatives) are therefore not part of the Pam app. It’s my job to have a flat tummy & toned thighs.. and that’s not even that hard!
5. Take responsibility! If you want to feel amazing, you have to know about what you eat, the quality of the ingredients and how your dish was prepared. You should not give the responsibility about your health to somebody else. That means: less processed foods, more homemade meals!

GET READY FOR:
• A big selection of recipes - with monthly updates.

RECIPES

• 95% for a fit lifestyle, 5% by my brother Dennis & 100% delicious.

WORKOUTS

• Workout Planner: structure your week of exercise with the workout planner tool. If you want, you can also copy my „Pam Workout Plan“.

MEMBERSHIP OPTIONS
